org.mokai
Interface ExposableConfiguration<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the configuration object.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddPrefixAction, AddSpacesAction, AddSuffixAction, AndAcceptor, ConcatAction, CopyAction, ExactMatchAcceptor, JsonParserAction, OrAcceptor, RegExpAcceptor, RemoveAction, ReplaceAction, RoundRobinProcessor, UpdateAction
public interface ExposableConfiguration<T>

Implemented by extensions (receivers, processors, acceptors and actions) that expose a configuration object.

Author:
German Escobar
